name: Agent C00k13
description:
Evil Cookie stealing robots are stealing all the sweets!! The children are devastated! Agent Cook13 is our only hope.

The only thing that can stop the robots is of course to throw cookies at them.

Save our sweets!


Controls:
Left/right arrow = forward/back.
up = jump (pro tip: continuous jumping on edge lets you climb)
space = throw cookie

Game is made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 32, please rate if you can! http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/?action=preview&uid=36119
